00471 #ifndef _KVI_WINDOW_CPP_
00472         // The active window:
00473         //   This is almost always non null
00474         //   The exception is the startup (when there are no windows at all)
00475         //   and the last phase of the destructor.
00476         //   You usually shouldn't care of checking this pointer for NULL unless
00477         //   you're running very early at startup or very late at shutdown
00478         extern KVIRC_API KviWindow * g_pActiveWindow;
00479 #endif
00480 
00481 inline QByteArray KviWindow::encodeText(const QString & szText)
00482 {
00483         if(m_pTextCodec)
00484                 return m_pTextCodec->fromUnicode(szText);
00485         else
00486                 return defaultTextCodec()->fromUnicode(szText);
00487 }
00488 
00489 inline QString KviWindow::decodeText(const char * pcText)
00490 {
00491         if(m_pTextCodec)
00492                 return m_pTextCodec->toUnicode(pcText);
00493         else
00494                 return defaultTextCodec()->toUnicode(pcText);
00495 }
00496 
00497 #endif //_KVI_WINDOW_H_
